description: Mobile techniques used by RCSAndroid, ATT&CK software S0295 v1.2
name: RCSAndroid (S0295)

techniques.comment: RCSAndroid can collect contacts and messages from popular applications, including Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Line, WeChat, Hangouts, Telegram, and BlackBerry Messenger.
RCSAndroid can use SMS for command and control.
RCSAndroid can record audio using the device microphone.
RCSAndroid can capture photos using the front and back cameras.
RCSAndroid can collect SMS, MMS, and Gmail messages.
RCSAndroid can collect passwords for Wi-Fi networks and online accounts, including Skype, Facebook, Twitter, Google, WhatsApp, Mail, and LinkedIn.
RCSAndroid has the ability to dynamically download and execute new code at runtime.
